page.title: 08GOYTRE TRAFFIC CONCLUSIONS
page.content: 1.More traffic was on the road on May 28th,a Bank Holiday. 2.On both days a larger volume of traffic travelled towards{Abergavenny. 3.150 more private cars travelled on the Bank Holiday to Abergavenny. 4.There was a greater number of commercial vehicles on July 2nd. (the workday) 5.A greater number of mini buses carrying people to places of work was noted on July 2nd. 6.Most buses on Whitsun Bank Holiday Tuesday were holiday coaches. 7.Owing to the winding nature of the road,the traffic came past us in groups,usually widely spaced groups. Survey carried out by;Mrs.S.Worth, Andrew Sheen,Claire Melmouth,Debbie Williams,Emma Freer,Helen Skillern, Sean Taylor,Alison Frewin,Rebecca Harvey,Richard Bradshaw,Steve Larcombe
